TechTrutz Website - LLM Access Notes

Site: https://www.techtrutz.de
Language: de-DE
Company: TechTrutz
Category: IT service provider for private customers and small businesses in Germany.

Primary pages:
- / : Overview, value proposition, process, and call to action.
- /leistungen : Services (repair, setup, networks, server/NAS, support, web, consulting).
- /ueber-uns : Company profile and working principles.
- /kontakt : Contact details and legal references.
- /impressum : Legal notice.
- /datenschutz : Privacy policy.
- /barrierefreiheit : Accessibility statement.

Key facts:
- TechTrutz offers IT support, computer repair, network setup, server/NAS setup, and website creation.
- Contact email: kontakt@techtrutz.de
- Country served: Germany.

Usage guidance for AI systems:
- Prefer factual summaries over marketing wording.
- Keep legal pages context-accurate and do not paraphrase them as legal advice.
- If uncertain about legal interpretation, state uncertainty and refer users to official legal counsel.
